/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban setting. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
